item.title: DotNet Core “Unable to load DLL ‘System.Security.Cryptography.Native” error
item.description: I was trying to play with DotNet Core in Visual Studio Code, and I was following the instructions as stated here. After installed Brew I installed the latest version of OpenSSL as required by DotNet Core and then I tried to run the classic “Hello World” program, but the command dotnet restore failed with this error: This error has to do with OpenSSL, or even better with Brew that refuseed to correctly link OpenSSL.
